title: The Shining
description: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where a sinister presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from both past and future.

title: It
description: Seven young outcasts fight an evil demon that preys on the children of their small Maine town, emerging every 27 years.

title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
description: A young boy discovers he is a wizard and begins his education at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
description: Harry's second year at Hogwarts becomes far more exciting when a mysterious force begins turning students to stone.

title: A Game of Thrones
description: In a land where summers can last decades and winters a lifetime, trouble is brewing as sinister forces are massing beyond the kingdom's protective Wall.

title: Pride and Prejudice
description: The romantic clash between the opinionated Elizabeth and her proud beau, Mr. Darcy, is a splendid performance of civilized sparring.

title: Norwegian Wood
description: A poignant story of one college student's romantic coming-of-age, set against the backdrop of late-1960s Tokyo.

title: Half of a Yellow Sun
description: A masterly, haunting novel from a writer heralded by The Washington Post Book World as 'the 21st-century daughter of Chinua Achebe.'

title: The Old Man and the Sea
description: The story of an old Cuban fisherman and his supreme ordeal: a relentless, agonizing battle with a giant marlin far out in the Gulf Stream.

title: One Hundred Years of Solitude
description: The multi-generational story of the Buendía family, whose patriarch, José Arcadio Buendía, founds the town of Macondo.

title: The Handmaid's Tale
description: A dystopian novel set in a totalitarian society in what was formerly the United States, now called the Republic of Gilead.

title: Foundation
description: A saga of a Galactic Empire in decline and the efforts of a scientist to shorten the inevitable Dark Ages to follow.

title: Beloved
description: After the Civil War, a former slave begins a new life with her children, but the haunting memory of her past proves inescapable.

title: The Fellowship of the Ring
description: The first volume in J.R.R. Tolkien's epic adventure The Lord of the Rings, featuring the beginning of Frodo's quest.

title: Murder on the Orient Express
description: A murder aboard a stranded train leaves detective Hercule Poirot to solve the case with a limited number of suspects.
